articles.author: Andrea Blanco
articles.title: Mexico kidnapping — live: Americans seized by drug cartel asked for directions before deadly Matamoros attack - The Independent
articles.description: Video appears to capture the moment Latavia ‘Tay’ Mcgee, Shaeed Woodard, Zindell Brown and Eric James Williams were kidnapped in Matamoros – an area dominated by the Gulf drug cartel
articles.content:
Gulf drug cartel believed to be behind attack
Governor of Tamaulipas Américo Villarreal said during a press conference that the group was moved from different locations, including a clinic, during t… [+1248 chars]
